body: Hi Guys And This New Post Is Bout Sending Photos In These Boxes You Use To Write In Because Soon im gonna be making a map on my mates server and i dont really know how to send them up. I know theres a icon button for links but i dont send them like on google images so, how do i send my map pics/screenshots in these boxes thank you! <3
